body:
Fixes #15553 

Besides updating release 3.12.4, this fixes a build error by constraining hdf5 to up 1.10 for existing releases.

`develop` and the next release (3.13) will (hopefully) support HDF5 1.12 directly,
so their behavior is unchanged, but for exisiting releases this one makes them build again by
 falling back to HDF5 1.10.
title: petsc fix hdf5
